title: Ping constantly spiking high and not stable anymore.
body:
I am currently living in an apartment on college, so I don't have access to the router or router settings. FYI. 

I am running league and have been experiencing constantly changing ping from 30-200 and the game freezes and i will be 'jumping around map'. The game will freeze for a second and then fix itself, but this is constant throughout the game.  I used to run fine with a stable ~30 ping and only have a couple lag spikes, that quickly resolve.  My roommates are not experiencing this lag, I have used my account on their computer and it runs fine.  I have reinstalled the wifi drivers, and reinstalled League to no avail.  The game is basically unplayable now and I don't know what to do...  Suggestions??

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some big connection problems, and you may need to contact whoever admins your network.  Before doing that, you can do some troubleshooting to rule out possibilities closer to home.   You can use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot some problems that could be caused locally, in which case you won't have to reach out.  Hopefully the guide will help get all this fixed!
I have this issue as well as of two days ago, this game is basically unplayable.
Same here been trying to play but every game i'm thoroughly lagging spikes reaching  500^ is there no fix for this it's terrible man

I have a similar issue. My connection is fine and I am able to open websites and load videos on YouTube but in League, my ping will spike very high (above 10000) and then sometimes I have low ping but the game is freezing. Most of my friends don't experience such an issue but there are a few of us who do.
yea, occasionally i will have it spike to 2k+ ping and its so annoying. I don't know what else to do :/
